name: Sheff G
description: '''Michael Kyle Williams''' (born September 23, 1998), known professionally as '''Sheff G''', is an American rapper. He rose to fame with his 2017 single "No Suburban", which was a response to the song "Suburban" by [[22Gz]]. 22Gz response with a song titled "Retaliation", and Sheff G responded with "No Suburban Pt.2  Williams is widely known as one of the vanguards of the [[Brooklyn drill]] movement. On May 16, 2023, Williams was indicted with 31 other purported gang members responsible for several shooting incidents and at least one murder over a two-year span.
